QuestData.Title: Camelraderie
QuestData.Description: Greetings, friend!$b$bYou are always most welcome in my humble tent.$b$bLooking for something to do? Sullah has just the thing!$b$bCamels are good to have in hand regardless, but when putting together a performance the likes of my sideshow, they are an absolute must!$b$bTake this harness and use it to subdue a wandering camel.$b$bYou may have to, uhh, humble it a bit first... if you know what I mean.$B$BYou'll find a desert full of wild camels to the south.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Sullah's Harness to tame 3 Camels.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to tame some camels for me yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it!$b$bI now have camels to spare. Perhaps one day we shall take our show on the road!
